title: Introducing: 0.1
content:
Unlikely to appeal to all, 0.

1’s tracks available so far are complex, slightly bizarre compositions, but greatly intriguing. Never tying itself down to a particular genre, the highlight of his 25 cuts so far is Softism, which furiously morphs between electronic and dub influences, to freak-folk inspirations, with the haunting vocals floating mystically over the top. The solo project of Robert Streckfuss from Australia, 0.1 embodies the true spirit of DIY dream-pop, quite hoe he’s gone relatively unnoticed for so long is completely beyond me. It’s tender and ferocious in equal measures, unsettling whilst beauteous, and above all, bloody brilliant. Check out Softism below, and head over to his Soundcloud for more.
